tweet.text: View the Nov. 6, 1979 minutes of President Carter’s first National Security Council meeting on possible responses to the U.S. Embassy in Tehran takeover and seizing of U.S. hostages, just released in #FRUS: https://t.co/dxK9aW6nXu https://t.co/FxHUS9J8mC
